storyInfo: There's a strum of strings in the ears. Is it grey matter and the ego playing illusory tricks... or is someone filling the monastery with sonata?

attributes.content: We don't usually greet our visitors at gunpoint, save for special occasions.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Pardon me if you're dissatisfied with your treatment in any way.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Indecipherable howling)
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: (Not reacting at all to what I say. Is communication completely out the window?)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Not many human features left to show. Is it all hidden under those scales?)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (...I remember Iberian files mentioning this sort of mutation before...)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You couldn't be...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oofff...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Nope, the wheelchair's not going to cut it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Strange. Something's not right.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Is its target... not me?)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Where is it aiming? What is it trying to—)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Too close...!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Forget it, I'll have to worry about that later!)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Nuh-uh, just because I'm physically handicapped doesn't mean you can pick on me, visitor!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Angry howling)
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: Stop right there—!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Nope—I can't just let you slip away!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: When the elderly chat, the topic inevitably turns to Laterano
They call it bright, abundant, safe for all, disturbed by none.
They say it's true paradise on Terra.
The truth is, they all know the monastery's been adrift for decades, and only a dwindling few remain who've actually seen Laterano before. Perhaps two or three, or maybe just it's Bishop Stefano now.
They bring up Laterano, but the object of their nostalgia is a dream they're long overdue to wake from.
A dream where the sun shines and the flowers are underfoot forever.
Just as the monastery used to be, all those years ago.
They're about to wither.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: They bloomed earlier than last year. I could guess they'd wither sooner too. I just didn't think it'd be this soon...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The few you picked were in wonderful blossom. They're not about to wilt yet.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: How pretty. Who'll be receiving these?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I'm too late. There's no giving them now.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: They can't save anyone...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Sorrow. Pain. Despair.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Mm... such complex overtones. There are other emotions hidden inside you, too...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Are you angered?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I wouldn't dare... You're a guest of His Excellency, Seniora Arturia.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You wouldn't dare, that's all. A very honest answer.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: My intuition has always been unusually accurate, Senior Florist. You seem to loath me a little.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: No, not at all. You needn't worry.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: If anything is troubling you, I could be of help to you, I think.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Help...? Er, I'm not sure what you mean, Seniora Arturia.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What would you help with?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: This hinges on your thoughts. It's not something for me to decide.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Of course, you may not need any help at all. Call me meddlesome if you wish, or a bearer of bad intent, none of which I would mind. It's for you to say.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I just want to hear your thoughts... your own thoughts.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You're a strange one, Seniora Arturia.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You say you can help me...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Of course, so long as you need.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: No, there's no need.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Perhaps you could... well, there's a great many you can help, but you can't help me.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Seniora Arturia, would you claim to be able to raise the dead?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Can you make the harvest rich, or see that the cold winds stop?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'm very sorry, but I can't.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Then can you return us to your original lives, see that the barriers of old are no more?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You could never.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Then what of you, Clément?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Have you never once entertained being able to solve all you speak of, by your own hands?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: ...I've tried...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: But it was no use. I've tried more than once, but I couldn't do it.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The more effort we put in, the worse things get, more often than not...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: No one can make it all better. The Abbot can't, Gerald can't... and neither can I.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You can't help me, Seniora Arturia.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Please... don't bring this up again. And don't think I need the help of someone like you.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You ask what my thoughts are. Let me tell you: I have no thoughts at all.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What else can I come up with? The coming winter is too cold.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Cold. Yes, this heart is like soil frozen through, beneath a sheet of iciness...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Yet I can feel notes lurking beneath the ice... I wonder how powerfully they will move us?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: It's not yet time. This composition is not bound for completion yet...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Such unbearableness, such tolerance... mm... in times like these, I cannot help myself.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Let me see...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Ah, this melody is a perfect fit for the occasion.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Federico.
I told you, your melodies are too rhythmic, too unperturbed. You should know that an all-too-rational melody will lack the sentiments to shake people. There's no warmth, nor passion...
Sometimes, I can only be curious.
Federico, when will you finally realize... why it is you search?
(Strings?)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (No, this is more than strings. There are Originium Arts effecting something within.)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (These Arts, and this melody. Could they be...?)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (The sounds are nearing.)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (Are they above?)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What's today's song? It's beautiful.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Do you hear music every day here?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Erk! Wh—Who...?
attributes.name: Startled Inhabitant

attributes.content: I am Executor Federico of the Notarial Hall. Please answer my question.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Notarial Hall? What does that even...? Oh, I see, you're that guest from Laterano they were talking about, aren't you?
attributes.name: Startled Inhabitant

attributes.content: Sometimes you can, er, hear this music around this time? I'm not too sure myself.
attributes.name: Startled Inhabitant

attributes.content: Oh, right! I believe I heard about someone by the sacrarium who plays a cello or something...
attributes.name: Startled Inhabitant

attributes.content: Where is the sacrarium?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: On the roof. Take the stairs outside and you'll be right—wait, ex-excuse me, Senior?!
attributes.name: Startled Inhabitant

attributes.content: What was the rush...? Such a strange man.
attributes.name: Startled Inhabitant

attributes.content: Welcome back, boss.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Yeah. How ready are we to move out?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: More or less good. We don't have much to take with us, and we'd be overburdened anyway if we did.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: But there's been no word from the young ones we sent to scout the way... They might not make it in time for tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Wait a little longer.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Stefano and I have talked it over. That we're leaving... he'll let it be. So no need to rush it now. If we still hear nothing by nightfall, then I'll take a team myself to find them.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Sure. I'll update everyone in a minute.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Oh, boss! There's one other thing...
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Hyman hasn't come back either... I looked around for her, but she's nowhere to be found.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Is Raimund still gone as well?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Got it. Leave this to me.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: But if Hyman never shows up, should we... wait?
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Tomorrow morning at the latest. If anyone's still not back after Matins, you and Raimund will set off with rest as planned.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: I'll stay behind. Dead or alive, I'll find Hyman.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I swear, I'd never abandon a single one of you.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: That's all we're worried about.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: *mumble*, you always take too much on yourself.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Let's not bring up that name again.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You call me boss. I have a duty to find you a way out.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: And I see you walking down a dead end.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Hahaha. I know what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Forget all that, no need to look so sad. Go on, get everything good and ready.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Shift change.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Wargh...!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: There's a fright... hi there, Serpilia.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Who else would you expect? Does Federico ever bother with this sort of work?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: How's the girl in there...? Doing bad?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Bad in a way. She hasn't said a word. Seems she's in shock.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I eyed over the scene. Aren't you the least bit curious about what actually happened?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I... can more or less guess.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You and I both know how powerful a gun is. With that much blood loss... anyone would be doomed, wouldn't they?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Your face says I'm on the mark.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Did you tell her?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What? Oh, as in, that she might already be dead? Of course not.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: She's unsettled right now. Telling her the truth could just as well cause more problems.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: So what is your plan? Lie to her and say nothing's wrong, muddle through, figure out the rest later, I bet?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You make it sound so bad... but still, that's basically it.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Serpilia, something seems a little fishy with your emotions. What happened?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: None of your business. I'm doing great.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: If you say so, then. No problems in Serpilia-land.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Okay. I'll leave her to you.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hmph. Every undependable bastard's on parade today.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: (An accident caused by an unintentional discharge...)
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: (Ha. And so what?)
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: (If I hadn't helped her...)
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What? Make it quick.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Wait, what do you mean Sarkaz in the outer vicinity? Are they still trying to break your blockade?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Just a few? Scouting the road?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Fine, got it. What about Oren?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No, you can leave Oren to me. I'll contact him.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Listen, here's what you guys do next...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Seriously... what a good runner!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: *huff*...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Or maybe I just lost it...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Back in the old days, I would've put them away clean in a fraction of the time.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Times like these... I can't help but feel a little mad.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: There you are...!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Guess it's not the time to brood just yet.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (The sound of strings is growing clear. I am steadily approaching the source.)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (But the Arts are diminishing in strength. Are they giving up casting, or... hm?)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Senior Federico? What are you doing here...?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I was not referring to you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Er, excuse me...?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Are you lost? If you don't mind, I can—
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Stop talking.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Mmff?! Mrmmffff!!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What... What was that? That monster...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I do not know.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: It's fled downstairs! Not good... Gerald's group live down there!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Stay still.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Someone is here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I heard gunfire this way, so I came to test my luck.
Cardinal Aide Lemuen, Serpilia's report stated that you would not be operating in the field.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Don't blame her. If I'm honest, I didn't think I would be either.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But then came a slight twist...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We'll catch up later. Are you on your own, Federico? Is nobody else operating with you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I am on my own.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Then let's keep it short. I'm on the trail of a surprise... visitor.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I won't keep you too long...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: So here, be good and tell me.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Which way did my 'visitor' happen to go?
attributes.name: Lemuen
